message.content:
cs.IT, cs.MA, cs.SY, cs.NI, cs.GT

Reasoning: 
1. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The paper deals with transmission policies for energy harvesting sensors, which involves information transmission. 
2. cs.MA (Multi-Agent Systems) - The paper considers the case of multiple sensors, with only one of them allowed to transmit at any given time, which can be viewed as a multi-agent system. 
3. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper deals with optimizing the energy consumption of sensors, which can be viewed as a control problem. 
4. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The paper deals with transmission policies for sensors, which can be viewed as a networking problem. 
5. cs.GT (Computer Science and Game Theory) - The paper derives optimal policies for energy harvesting sensors, which can be viewed as a game between the sensors and the environment.
